website_summaries.verdict: A compact, entry-level MIG welder with a variety of innovative features that is priced on the budget end of the scale.
pros: This is a very light duty welder that is designed for the beginner
It is available at a fraction of the price of other models
It features a built-in compartment for accessories, 4 amperage settings, and a dial to adjust the wire feeding speed
cons: The included welding mask leaves a lot to be desired, you're better off purchasing one separately

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE,  GOOD PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mig 130 for my Husband as a gift . It had some problems, I called and they sent me another unit. Works fine... GREAT CUSTOMER SEVICE !
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this welder.
customer_reviews.text: Got my welder today and I’m very pleased with it. I took care of a couple of lite duty projects around the house and the welder did great. The mask they give you SUX, the slag hammer/brush SUX but the welder actually performs, Best $109.00 bucks I ever spent. Be careful of youtube reviews and opinions on small flux core welders because 90% of its BS.. I watched 4-5 vids from self proclaimed professionals that said these little welders would pop the breakers in my house and silly stuff like that. Guess what? Didn’t pop a single breaker. Little more practice and I might even zap together some yard-art! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Tim Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Change the wire spool right away
customer_reviews.text: Worked much better once I changed the wire spool to brand name. The spool included only weights like 6 oz. or less, and is very cheap. Machine feeds wire good, and it's easy to use. Very small box, it doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca groppi

customer_reviews.title: Used for over 2 years so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used this little welder for over 2 years I've done small and large work with it. Every time we have a project that has to be done everyone wants to use this welder even though we have ones far more expensive it's done work from repairing a metal fence to welding up a gram on a trailer this can handle a lot of jobs very well you need to learn how to handle it but this welder won't disappoint you. After so long and so much use it never gives me a problem, very dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn spencer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is junk. It's NOT a MIG welder.  This is a Flux Core welder.  Ripoff!
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how Amazon can allow a seller to list an item that is NOT what it says it is. This is clearly false advertising. A MIG welder has a gas bottle and it allows you to GAS weld. MIG stands for Metal Inert Gas. Except with this welder there is no inert gas. And it does NOT join two metals. It is a flux core solderer which attempts to "super glue" two metals together. No bonding is done with this welder. JUNK! DO NOT BUY!!!! Well unless gluing two metals to together is what you are attempting to do. Good Luck.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Unit not working properly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first unit and the feed wire would come out with the feed control at zero. They were great to work with they sent me a second unit and I plug it in and it worked as it should. I put it away and couple of days later I plug it in and it’s doing the same thing as the first unit. I can weld with it but it’s difficult when I can’t slow the feed wire down.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Huskey

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome! There is a YouTube video on how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! There is a YouTube video on how to feed the wire spool into the machine. If this is your first time ever using a wirefeed welder, watch the video and it's fairly straightforward. I had never used a wirefeed welder before, so I simply looked up a video on YouTube and had this welder going in about 10 minutes. I welded my sons broken lamp and this welder worked great. Do yourself a favor and buy a nice welding helmet because the handheld mask that comes with this welder requires you to hold it up to your face with your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L

customer_reviews.title: Knocked out of the Park
customer_reviews.text: Not a professional. What I have found with this welder is the ease of use. You turn it on and it is ready to go, absolutely love that. Also read other reviews as some folks have great tips as speed settings, wire gauge, and the best place to plug it into. I plug into a circuit that is 20 Amps, so no issues. This the first welder I have owned as I desire to learn, but buying an Miller or Hobart comes with quite a higher price, for a beginner. I will say this is a great product, these folks knocked it out of the park. It is worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkbees007

customer_reviews.title: Awsome once you go around minor problems
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really work well with very thin sheet metal, its a mig so Id expect that. It keeps on tripping the power, would recommend getting a high amp extenstion cord. Plugged mine into one of the washer outlets. If you are plugging it in a socket, make sure it is 20-30 amps NOT 15. The orginal spool seems to splatter way more than a diffrent spool.
customer_reviews.author: Ilikeduhrice

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheap Welder!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome been doing lots of welding for car projects I have and it works like a charm! Can't beat that price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good Welder
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say I'm impressed by how fast it was delivered. But as for the use it was pretty good. I'm a hobbiest blacksmith/metal worker/fabricator and this machine works great. Simple set up and operation. I suggest using the crappy flux core it comes with to practice with this machine. Takes alittle getting used to but overall works great. Plugged it into a single extention cord to the main plug where my deep freezer is plugged into. Ran it on highest setting and never tripped the breaker. I would definitely suggest this machine if your a beginner or hobbiest. Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKED FINE. I DID USE SOME OF THE RECOMENDATIONS FROM ...
customer_reviews.text: I ONLY USED IT ONCE WITH A 40 FOOT EXTENSION CORD, MUCH LONGER THEN RECOMENDED. IT WORKED FINE. I DID USE SOME OF THE RECOMENDATIONS FROM OTHER CUSTOMERS AND PURCHASED A VERY GOOD GROUNDING CLAMP AND TOP SHELF WIRE. IM SURE THOSE TWO ITEMS HELP. EVEN WITH THE RESISTANSE IN THE LONG CORD , I HAD NO CIRCUT BREAKERS KICK OFF. FOR THE COST HOW CAN YOU GO WRONG? THE ALTERNETIVE OF BEGGING SOME ONE WITH A PORTABLE WELDER TO COME AND WELD FOR ME WOULD HAVE BEEN COSTLY AND TIME CONSUMING
customer_reviews.author: Bikers56flh

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a waste of money. I regret not going out and just buying a name brand welder. Doesn't feed wire correctly so layin a nice bead is almost impossible. I tried to return this item but cannot get a response from the seller. Good for scrap metal and thats about it. Junk. Junk. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: KrystalnJay

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good welder
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be ok welding 1/8 inch steel,it took some practice to “dial” it in(I’ve always been a stick welder) I’ve not welded any steel thicker or thinner yet,from all the reviews I’ve read it should be ok welding thicker and thinner steel,I just have to learn how to set the heat and wire speed I like how the welder works just wish it had a better duty cycle
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Needs upgrades even for novice use
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded mine with decent flux wire, serious ground clamp, a dedicated transformer to power the wire feeder, decent labels for the power settings, and holders to hang the torch, ground, and supply cables when not used. It works fine that way. But you might as well spend another $50 or $100 and get one that comes with those things.
customer_reviews.author: cb750

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great little welder to have around for small projects. Fixed a few things with ease. Next project will be to fix a couple holes in my riding lawn mower cutting deck. Easy to set up and start welding. It's flux core so a lot of splatter but overall I would recommend for small jobs, art pieces or beginner's.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond W.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BANG FOR THE BUCK!
customer_reviews.text: THIS SEEMS TO BE A VERY WELL BUILT PIECE OF MACHINERY. COULDN'T JUSTIFY OR AFFORD AN ACTUAL MIG FOR THE JOBS I WILL BE DOING ON MY TRUCK AND AROUND THE HOUSE. VERY STURDY AND COMES WITH NICE EQUIPMENT. WILL UPDATE WHEN I START THROWING SPARKS.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I only use this a couple of times a month. Ive had if for about a year now and I really am pleased with the price and the quality of the welder. I did toss the wire that came with it and purchased a roll of 030 blue demon instead.
customer_reviews.author: NW Ghia Guy

customer_reviews.title: It worked as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Unit performed as expected. Arrived with dents in the metal body which prevented the top from opening where the wire spool is placed. I was able to straighten the metal an open the top the box was undamaged therefore the unit was not damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: david griffith

customer_reviews.title: It caught 🔥 while it was on.
customer_reviews.text: Had it here awhile and decided to give it a try. It caught 🔥 inside where the wire feed wheels are. After the 🔥 it no longer works. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Levin

customer_reviews.title: It works.. Could be better
customer_reviews.text: This welder is a great value for what you get. It will get small things done around the house no problem. It has a low duty cycle so its not for big projects The only issue i really have is that the wire is always hot. The trigger only controls the feed not the feed and power that your likely used too
customer_reviews.author: Product King

customer_reviews.title: Cool Little Welder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this welder to use with my Home Repair business. I am always finding myself needing to weld small things here and there. I thought this would be perfect and it is. My order got damaged in shipping. The feeder pulley got bent. I ended up fixing it myself, but the companies customer service was amazing. I could of sent it back, but instead kept it with a generous discount. All that being said, this rig is perfect for an amateur welder, such as myself!! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhee A. Vertz

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for the price. But comes with a gas-style shield on the tip, which is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as it should. I am not an experienced welder, so take this for what it's worth. The included instructions are pretty lousy. But fortunately it's not terribly complicated. Max2 is the highest setting, Min1 is the lowest. I do suggest very highly that you get rid of the gas style shield that comes with it (the tube that fits around the tip) and put on one of the smaller cone style ones for gasless welding. I'm not even sure why they put a gas style shield on this machine, because it does not have gas capability. You really need the gasless shield to be able to see that the heck you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder
customer_reviews.text: Did my first weld, works great so far, can't beat price. If you buy it, manual and wire spool is inside welder, i originally thought it was missing. Instructions kind a suck, no pictures to visualize spool placement, luckily I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: anavarr519

customer_reviews.title: Welder worked well. It was all bent up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Welder worked well. It was all bent up and the flimsy mask was destroyed in shipping. But I was able to straighten it back out and successfully welded my mower deck as a beginner. Welder 5 stars, shipping 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Welder works great. I don't use it for anything heavy just small things. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tarkoba

customer_reviews.title: It works! Just get new wire and your good.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little welder so far. It is for light duty projects and repairs. The flux core wire that is included is not very good. I got some better flux core wire from the hardware store and it worked much better. I would recommend this for light duty stuff. I’m not a great welder by any means, just know enough to get some things done. Considering the price I give it 8 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Revo71

customer_reviews.title: Great welder for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this welder so far I have done so much work with it and it's worked beautifully compared to more expensive ones. There is no shielding gas so there is mor splatter but I still get clean welds with good penetration. Just have to adjust the settings right.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: What a great little buzz box. Great for projects up to medium size. Love to just plug into 110 and your up and running.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Welder that ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at this welder. I recently replaced rockers and some patched in body panels. I have to admit that it performed most excellent. Don't hesitate to buy this for a $100 bucks you won't be disappointed. I don't write reviews often but had to with this welder. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bartz

customer_reviews.title: Blows 20 amp breaker
customer_reviews.text: The welder I received you can only weld about an inch and a half and it blows a 20 amp breaker I thought the instructions say it should only take should use a 20 amp breaker but it blows my brand new 20 amp breaker I cannot use it like this I guess it will sit in the garage and collect dust. I have only used it three times in the couple years that I have owned it
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I welded the floors on my 66 Fairlane with this, it did the job, the ground clamp should be replaced it is no good. The welding wire it comes with is also hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashraf Kawar

customer_reviews.title: Bad product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Tension spring broke and auto feed motor stopped working after 4 months wouldn’t buy again and wouldn’t even give me a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 130amp welder
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to move.. U must clean both items ur welding for a decent weld.. The cleaner the better ... really good for small jobs.. I just put in floor pans on my 73 baja bug with it..
customer_reviews.author: DWF

customer_reviews.title: Does what you would expect a low end welder to ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what you would expect a low end welder to do. I made an ugly but functional bracket to raise my 160 lb outboard motor. Two years, and still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Great Welder 👍
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what it is, the standard wire that comes with the welder doesn't get very hot and easily be used for sheet metal. Swapping to a nicer wire increases the temps making thicker metals much easier to weld, but almost impossible to use on sheet metal.
customer_reviews.author: James West

customer_reviews.title: Instructions aren't great and flux-core wire sucks compared to my MIG setup ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit works well for what it is. Pulls light duty as a mobile welder at the house. Instructions aren't great and flux-core wire sucks compared to my MIG setup but it gets the job done. Worth the money in my opinion, not brilliant but good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Good welder, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice little welder. I had some issues with the first one shipped, and was surprised at how accommodating and responsive the customer service folks were. They made everything right, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Takacs

customer_reviews.title: The wire melts when it hits another surface but the quality of the weld is so so at best
customer_reviews.text: The wire melts when it hits another surface but the quality of the weld is so so at best. I've used it for odd jobs around the house with varying degrees of success depending on the type of metal, but regardless of the type of metal you are never going to lay a bead that you are proud of but about 60-70% of the time it will do the a basic welding that is usable.
customer_reviews.author: red_rider374

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beinnger
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little machine works great straight out of the box. Definitely not a professional machine good for hobbyist and light duty metal work. For the price you can't beat it. If you not expecting Too Much from the machine you be very happy with it 😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Jc2059008

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent works well for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me.Have fixed several things around the ranch with this welder.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Richards

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality for the price. Great for light work and very handy working on 110V service. Can carry it around to do small jobs with ease. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a christmas present for my husband he wanted one from harbor freight that was more expensive than this one soo glad i found this one it was cheaper much better quality and more powerful he loves it he os doing jobs with it around the house and has done some fixes on trailers and things love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal.
customer_reviews.text: Got the welder in good time. Hooked it up to 110v plug and tried welding on high. it tripped the 20 amp breaker after about 1 min. I reset the breaker and dropped the current down and welded a 1/2 inch bead. I have never used a welder like this before and bought it to weld light material. I'm sure it will do that just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W. P.

customer_reviews.title: Need a 50A 120 V supply
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine except you cant run this off of a 120V 20A outlet. Trips the breaker every time. Docs dont say anything about this but the unit requires a 50A 120V supply.
customer_reviews.author: ERC

customer_reviews.title: not a DC output welder.
customer_reviews.text: using this for lite duty art,and farm repair,fabrication.It is ok for the price,is light and handy,but it is NOT a dc output welder,and therefore,does not run flux core wire very good. Is rated for 20 amps,but if I run a long string weld,it trips 20 amp breaker.Short welds,with short extension cord, below max amps,and it does fine.
customer_reviews.author: thomas spell

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for its designed purposep. Will not weld the big stupp, but that's not what it's for.dont figure on using the hood.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Could never get it to work. When I tried to return it they asked me to send them a video. I never got around to creating a video so it is collecting dust in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Jake keenan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for this welder.
customer_reviews.text: Still learning to use this, but so far it has worked well and was easy to setup. I am sticking metal together but it isnt always pretty! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tony in PBG

customer_reviews.title: Light duty
customer_reviews.text: As expected light duty, but for less than a hundred bucks you should not expect anything better, ok for small welds, the only reason it is getting 4 stars is because the fase shield is garbage
customer_reviews.author: Digital Solutions Expert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but no problems with it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to fix up exhaust work and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far got test laid a test bead on on clean 1/4 plate maid penetration for the steel to be dirty
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Lite duty
customer_reviews.text: The welder worked as advertised, and I'm very happy with basic operation. However, it is for lite welding only. Tried to weld 1/8th inch mild steel, no go.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas O Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great for small projects
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the small items I need to repair and for the sculpturing, I create in iron and steel. I love the wire feed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian PropstTop Contributor: Soap Making

customer_reviews.title: Works well on items less than 1/8"
customer_reviews.text: Works well on items less than 1/8". Any thicker and a bigger machine is needed or a buss box.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great welding machine
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat this thing for the price. It’s my first and only welding machine so I have little to compare to. With virtually no experience I made this table pictured for my wife. I definitely recommend good surface prep (shiny metal for arc surface and neutral clamp) and to use .030” wire instead of the .035” it comes with. You wouldn’t think 5 thousandths of an inch would make a difference, but it really does. For reference, the frame pictured it 1” square tubing with 1/8” wall. Max 2 was too powerful and it was burning through with .030” wire.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A+ welder for the money!
customer_reviews.text: All positive reviews for this welder are spot on! It's great value for the money. Repaired my mowing deck no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has a little weight but works perfectly...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good welder, has room for a new role of wire on top also plus a few more things you may want along...
customer_reviews.author: Yogi Bellcourt

customer_reviews.title: Did the job just fine. I’m no welder but for what I do ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed to have the muffler welded on my lawnmower. Was going to cost $75. Figured I might as well try this welder and if it worked I come out way ahead. Did the job just fine. I’m no welder but for what I do with it I can’t complain
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought better wire, had for years now , works perfect for small jobs like exhaust pipes
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Good product value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nice welder for the money. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Good welder it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Good welder it's ok. I just didn't like the fact when I revived it looked like used and also scratched otherwise I recommend for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto arevalo

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I mean I’m cheap. And this worked. I built a trailer with it. Definitely not the best welder but for little jobs it’s cool
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Giron

customer_reviews.title: Get quality wire.
customer_reviews.text: Use a quality wire turn the feed to 2 and start from there. 1 and 2 switch is a step down and up in power settings.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: price is great as
customer_reviews.text: awsome Machine. does the job very well. price is great as well
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This has been a nice little splatter box
customer_reviews.text: This has been a nice little splatter box. It actually welds better than I expected and hasn't burned me yet. Get a quality flux core spool of wire and you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C

customer_reviews.title: welder
customer_reviews.text: for the money i guess its ok that's about all i can say
customer_reviews.author: carter

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I love this welder, I welded one of my uncles trucks with this and it performed exceptionally well. Great for it's price, if you want a great gas free MIG welder this is the thing to buy! I also bought these great products with it also, go check e'm out -
customer_reviews.author: Skyler R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little welder that is fun to use. Very impressed with the price and quality of this item...and look forward to completing many little projects around the house with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: All around great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this welder for repairs and maintenance. Great price when I bought it, easy to use. Customer service was great. Product was damaged during shipping and they were prompt about getting me a new one
customer_reviews.author: Jim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Only holds 2lb roll
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can think I would want different is to be able to use a 10 lb roll
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little welder for the price. Only problem is it say an 10 amp breaker. I have it on a 15 amp. Machine doesn't over heat just flips breaker. Guess i try a 40 amp see what it does.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Bought as first welder and have been learning a lot. Would definitely recommend buying a different mask as to the fact that it is annoying to hold the mask with one hand while welding with other.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Now all I have to do is learn how to weld.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz The Cat

customer_reviews.title: it does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a MILLER, but I didn't expect that. For what it is, and what I paid, it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good welder for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little welder that allowed me to do some simple, around the house projects. The more I do, the better I'm getting. Not perfect, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great welder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great welder for a beginner. It has added settings which most other flux core welders do not have. For small jobs, this welder is more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Clark

customer_reviews.title: Won't own another one
customer_reviews.text: I can only well for 5 minutes before the machine shuts down after ten minutes it comes back on for 5 more minutes of welding
customer_reviews.author: Pete Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Needs better directions came in with the side dented in but ...
customer_reviews.text: Needs better directions came in with the side dented in but other than that looks good will update after I use it
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Goplus Mig 130
customer_reviews.text: This Is a tough welder, the quality Is very good, I was Impressed considering the price.....
customer_reviews.author: BoBoBlood

customer_reviews.title: Look for better quality.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Would NOT purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: ... welding but it sure comes in handy when you nice a small welder
customer_reviews.text: I no longer do much welding but it sure comes in handy when you nice a small welder.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Marguglio

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use , great price and great shipping , Great addition to my shop ! Did replace the ground clamp with a 400 amp brass one, made a lot of help
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven’t used it a lot but seems to do the job. I was a little disappointed with the penetration on the highest setting but I don’t plan on welding 1/4 inch steel everyday, so concern is limited.
customer_reviews.author: John Kinsler

customer_reviews.title: Great portable welder
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a small 110 volt and can take it anywhere you need to. Good for lighter metal
customer_reviews.author: Ron Trainor

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Ac or DC true mig or not; biggest bang for your buck, if you know what you are doing. 1/2” of steel could be bonded proper if you have training and do the prep. Perfect for private use.
customer_reviews.author: Mohjo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what he was looking for at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Exactly what he was looking for at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ebc

customer_reviews.title: Crap right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I set it up, plugged it in, barely got the feed and power dialed in and pop it doesn’t work. Don’t waste your time or money. Hope I get my money back at least
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cullum

customer_reviews.title: Be Advised, Only 3 Months Warranty By GoPlus!
customer_reviews.text: Used once in six months, then put new wire spool in and wire would not feed. Called GoPlus for help and found WARRANTY IS ONLY FOR 3 MONTHS On Their Products!! Fortunately I found the wire feed switch needed to be switched off and back on to correct the problem, so it appears to be working again for now.
customer_reviews.author: Classic DIY GUY

customer_reviews.title: Overheated
customer_reviews.text: The motor overheated and my husband had to replace the fan, after using it about five times.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dammeir

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder
customer_reviews.text: Great welder, it will do anything I want to weld.
customer_reviews.author: 80 Vette

customer_reviews.title: My problem solved
customer_reviews.text: Great welder for the price a definite buy that one 😎
customer_reviews.author: Total restorations

customer_reviews.title: Good little welder
customer_reviews.text: Good little welder. Maybe the only drawback is the fact that the weld power isn't controlled by the trigger, and is instead always hot. Had to bend the wire cover out to open it the first time as well. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: but still seems to be a good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a little dinged up, but still seems to be a good product for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely sucks, my profession is welding and I can’t make this thing penetrate

customer_reviews.title: sparky
customer_reviews.text: tacked in floor for 1963 corvair worked good for tacking in the sections still working on the other parts, Great do it yourself welder I mainly did sheet metal so far and works great

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad, he used it for a few things seemed well pleased with it

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Performed as expected. Durable. Have had no problem so far.

customer_reviews.text: It is cheaply made didn't work or feed the spool through the welder

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!!
customer_reviews.text: Glass for welding cover had broken corner idk if shipping damaged but no broken glass in the box just chipped so probably sent to me that way. The welder and everything else was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Catorson

product_meta.title: Goplus MIG 130 Welder Flux Core Wire Automatic Feed Welding Machine
feature_bullets: Household smart welder compact and exquisite MIG Gas welder, made of heavy duty stainless steel body, painted with durable yellow paints, ensure its long-last serving life-span.
Flux-cored wire, no gas welder uses convenient flux-cored wire, self release metal-inert Gas while welding, prevent oxidation of the welded part.

4 levels adjustable welding speed features 4 levels of current flow settings, by adjusting the 4 buttons for min/max, 1/2. Also features a wire feeding speed adjust rotary knob. 10 levels of wire feeding speeds for your choice.

Portable design & wide applications It is perfect for welding normal thin steel and iron, perfect for home DIY and general repairing work. Mini size but also practical, it will obtain a professional finish in welding. Features a easy carrying handle, light weight, compact design, Easy for translation and storage. Very convenient, can be used anywhere U need.

Many Complimentary Necessities: two air-vent on the machine to help heat dissipation. The welding gun with full-on/off safety control. Standard American triangle ground cord and automatic thermal safety protection. Comes with a reel of 0. 9mm, 0. 55lbs welding wire and a brush/Chipping Hammer.

specifications.Included Components: 1 x Welding Machine, 1 x Product Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars428 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
